basic_information.scholarship_name: Liberal Arts Honor Society Officer Scholarship

description: This scholarship recognizes the outstanding effort of a Liberal Arts Honor Society officer. Must be nominated by CLA faculty to apply. Eligibility Requirements Liberal Arts major Full-time student Minimum GPA of 3.0 Current Honor Society member Continuing student in the fall semester that the scholarship is awarded

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
